mapper.update: UPDATE user_basic t SET t.carbon_credits_month = (SELECT carbon_credits_month FROM carbon_credits_basic WHERE user_id = t.user_id), t.user_level = #{level}, t.nickname = #{nickname}, t.city_id = #{cityId}, t.user_image_path = #{userImagePath} WHERE user_id = #{userId}
mapper.select: SELECT b.* FROM ( SELECT t.*, @user_rank := @user_rank + 1 AS user_rank FROM (SELECT @user_rank := 0) r, (SELECT * FROM user_basic ORDER BY carbon_credits_month ASC) AS t ) AS b WHERE user_id = #{userId};

SELECT t.nickname, t.user_image_path, t.carbon_credits_month, @user_rank := @user_rank + 1 AS user_rank FROM (SELECT @user_rank := 0) r, (SELECT * FROM user_basic WHERE city_id = #{cityId} AND user_id = #{userId} ORDER BY carbon_credits_month ASC) AS t
SELECT * FROM report_monthly WHERE user_id = #{userId} AND `month` = #{month} AND `year` = #{year};
